div.div: Fish and benthos survey sites with reef type descriptors at each atoll.
div.p: Two dive surveys for fish were done at each site. * = fish survey sites where no benthic data were collected.
Click here for additional data file.

div.div: Taxa surveyed for abundance and biomass and their trophic group and functional characteristics.
div.p: All taxa were recorded to species level (not all species are listed here). Those split by body size are species that change diet with size. Trophic categories adapted from Green and Bellwood 2009, Sandin and Williams 2010, and feeding information based on Choat and Clements 1998, 2010; Clements et al. 2016. Species listed in {parentheses} are WIO species but were not observed in this study.
Click here for additional data file.

div.div: Mean density per hectare ± SD for each fish species per site.

div.p: Click here for additional data file.

div.div: Mean biomass (kg) per hectare ± SD for each fish species per site.

div.div: Mean percentage cover for each benthic category per hectare ± SD per site.
